[{"id":"dev-17368","entityId":"86-22812","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Manual confirmation] Alter booking before accepting request not possible"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Walid Dechri"},{"name":"created","value":"1581416180350"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17368"},{"name":"description","value":"
URLhttps://www.regiondo-dev-de.de/resellers/account/bookings
Account emaildemoaccount@regiondo
Supplier ID9357
Order #1581410207073774400
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Place booking with manual confirmation Booking number 1581410207073774400
  2. Try to alter booking (E.g Propose new date from 21-03-2020 to 29-02-2020 )

Actual result:

Order Item can not be updated because it is not fully invoiced

Expected result:

Altering booking before being accepting should be possible in this case :
1- When date is changed
2- When qty is changed

PS : price should not be updated

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksym Hopei"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"walid.dechri"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"m.hopei"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1581423289731"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"dev-15605","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"}]},{"name":"When is it needed ?","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":{"bg":"#0070e4","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Reproducible","value":["Yes"],"valueId":["Yes"],"color":null},{"name":"Account Segment","value":["Bronze"],"valueId":["Bronze"],"color":null},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"m.hopei","fullName":"Maksym Hopei"}]},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"First sprint","id":"Team Zulu:First sprint"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"89-66397","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image.png?file=89-66397&c=true"},{"value":"image1.png","id":"89-66398","url":"https://track.regiondo.com/_persistent/image1.png?file=89-66398&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"dev-17192","entityId":"86-22660","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[POS][API] Social login with facebook and google"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Viktoriia Karenko"},{"name":"created","value":"1579785912463"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"17192"},{"name":"description","value":"

Please add possibility to login with google and facebook with new oAuth2.0.
If reseller for current email doesn't exist please return an error "Unfortunately we cannot find a Regiondo account for this email address".

Input data:

access_token=facebook/google_access_token
scope=reseller-data,
grant_type=social_login,
client_id=POS,
client_secret=client_secret

Output data:

Same as we have for normal login
